bibl.title: Ten documentary fragments of late date
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Aberd. Inv. 86c P. E.E.S. Inv. 89A/4(a); 89A/127(a); 89A/148(b) P. Lond. II, 398a descr.; 398c descr.; III, 1069b descr. P. London Univ. College Inv. Arsinoe 29; 35; 37
Nikolaos Gonis, Ten Documentary Fragments of Late Date.

1. P. Lond. III, 1069b descr. Letter to Phoibammon, defensor civitatis. Hermopolis, sixth century. - 2. P. Lond. II, 398a descr. Receipt for embole. Provenance unknown, sixth / seventh century. - 3. P. E.E.S. Inv. 89A/148(b). Work contract (?). Arsinoe, early seventh century. - 4. P. E.E.S. Inv. 89A/127(a). Order to pay. Arsinoite nome, seventh century. - 5. P. London Univ. College Inv. Arsinoe 35. Arsinoite nome, early seventh century. - 6. P. E.E.S. Inv. 89A/4(a). Letter of Phoibammon to Dioskoros, comes. Provenance unknown, seventh century. - 7. P. London Univ. College Inv. Arsinoe 37. Receipt for money. Arsinoite nome, seventh century. - 8. P. Lond. II, 398c descr. Fiscal register. Hermopolite nome, seventh century. - 9. P. Aberd. Inv. 86c. Account and writing exercise. Arsinoite nome, late seventh century. - 10. P. London Univ. College Inv. Arsinoe 29. Memorandum. Arsinoite nome, late seventh century.
